name: More Buffet!
storyline:
You start out with a 3d globe you can spin and zoom to visit countries from Australia to Mexico. Then load up your plate with local food- whether you are in the mood for tacos, curry, sushi, fried rice, schnitzel, meat pies, hot dogs, or even bangers & mash, you’ll find your favorites! And if you don’t find just the right food already made, you can create your own tacos, nachos, burgers, hot dogs, pastas, or sushi. Roll & slice the sushi, roll up soft tacos, load up a burger with all the toppings you want, or create the ultimate pasta dish.

After you’ve gone through the world’s greatest buffet, you can eat it a bite at a time, or share your plate of food with friends via email.

If that’s not enough, More Buffet! also has achievements you can earn just by building different plates of food and discovering a few secrets. Full Game Center support means you can track your friend’s achievements and see who is doing the best!
summary:
Eat your way around the world in our biggest virtual food app yet! Make tacos & nachos, roll sushi, create your own pasta, build burgers & hot dogs, or fill your plate from over 150 different kinds of pre-made food from 9 countries.

More Buffet! brings a world of food to your iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch, with all the attention to detail & polish you’ve come to expect from Maverick Software, creators of the hit apps Cupcakes!, More Cookies!, More Toast!, and others.
